title: Correction to: Nonlinear social evolution and the emergence of collective action
content: This is a correction to: Benjamin Allen, Abdur-Rahman Khwaja, James L Donahue, Theodore J Kelly, Sasha R Hyacinthe, Jacob Proulx, Cassidy Lattanzio, Yulia A Dementieva, Christine Sample, Nonlinear social evolution and the emergence of collective action, PNAS Nexus, Volume 3, Issue 4, April 2024, https://doi.org/10.1093/pnasnexus/pgae131
